title: Spirit Island Digital
description: Achievements from the digital Spirit Island implementation

achievements.title: The Red Deal
achievements.description: Win a game with a blight card and adversary

achievements.title: Choose your Path
achievements.description: Play with a low complexity Spirit without Power Progression card

achievements.title: Feat Unending
achievements.description: Win a game by reaching Terror Level Victory.

achievements.title: Vigor
achievements.description: Win a game with a difficulty rating of 4 or higher

achievements.title: Puissance
achievements.description: Win a game with a difficulty rating of 6 or higher

achievements.title: Swift Response
achievements.description: Win a game by clearing the island of invaders at Terror Level 1.

achievements.title: The First Spirits Rise
achievements.description: Win at least one game with each core game spirit.

achievements.title: Canonical Geography
achievements.description: Win a game on the thematic map.

achievements.title: The Spice of Life
achievements.description: Prevail in all core game scenarios.

achievements.title: Expertise
achievements.description: Win a game with a difficulty rating of 8 or higher

achievements.title: Bittersweet Triumph
achievements.description: Win a sacrifice victory (win and lose at the same time).

achievements.title: Powers Awakened
achievements.description: Use each of the 102 Powers availabel in the core game.

achievements.title: Empires Rejected
achievements.description: Defat all core game adversaries on level 6

achievements.title: Against All Odds
achievements.description: Win a game with a difficutly rating of 17 or higher

achievements.title: Elemental Mastery
achievements.description: Reach all 64 Elemental thresholds available in the core game.
